Introduction

CherryBerry is a South Korean singer currently under 5 Corps Music. She is the former leader and main vocalist of the girl group VIVIDIVA, under the stage name Guu Me!, from 2015 until 2016 when the group disbanded. After the group's disbandment, she debuted as a soloist under the new stage name CherryBerry on March 28, 2017, with the digital single, "I'm Fine Now".
